now.title: Construction Work
now.description: I recently came across a friend who is currently working on a construction project. It might sound like a boring topic, but I'm very interested in construction and architecture.

now.title: Philosophical and Self-Improvement Books
now.description: Self-improvement books and philosophies are always amuse me. Philosophy can align with Software Engineering, while Self-Improvement really helps me to become a better person.

now.title: Entering Apple Ecosystem
now.description: I recently got my new Macbook, and I decided to learn Swift and iOS development. It's a very interesting topic, and I'm very interested in Apple ecosystem.
